text: Igor Dodon (; born 18 February 1975) is a Moldovan politician. He was the President of Moldova from 23 December 2016 to 24 December 2020. He was the leader of the Party of Socialists of the Republic of Moldova. He was Minister of Trade and Economics in the governments of Vasile Tarlev and Zinaida Grecean√Æi from September 2006 to September 2009 and was a member of the Parliament of Moldova from 2009 to 2016. He lost his re-election bid to former Prime Minister Maia Sandu on 15 November 2020. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Moldova
title: Igor Dodon
